java112.labs1

Class UsePrintWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.labs1.UsePrintWriter

  • public class UsePrintWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class demonstrates the use of the PrintWriter class for writing to files. It takes two arguments from the command line. The first argument is the name of the output file. The second argument is a first name.
    Author:
    eknapp
